module.name: Music on Hold
module.description: Uploading and management of sound files (wav, mp3) to be used for on-hold music.
module.changelog: *13.0.22.3* FREEPBX-14461 use the lowest value *13.0.22.2* FREEPBX-14461 alert PHP file size limits *13.0.22* Language Update *13.0.21* Put the right version in *13.0.20* FREEPBX-12656 Hang on upgrade of Music on Hold module *13.0.19* FREEPBX-12527 increase format length in DB *13.0.18* Trap file upload failure - better than a runtime exception by lidl *13.0.17* Visual styling issues cleaned up *13.0.16* Add simple mode *13.0.15* Recursively mkdir *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11729 generate the none category *13.0.13* Support all Asterisk supported media formats *13.0.12* Support global file name function *13.0.11* Fix formats *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10629 *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10378 dont delete a file when asked to not delete it *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10344, FREEPBX-10328 Fix deletion of music on hold files *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10328 and other tweaks *13.0.5* FREEPBX-6329, FREEPBX-5631, FREEPBX-6162, FREEPBX-4762, FREEPBX-1497, FREEPBX-7544, FREEPBX-6989 In browser playback *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9688 Fixes numerous issues *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9754 fixes visual issues *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Styling Changes *12.0.1* BMO Object *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Use rate instead of resample for sox resampling #6347 *2.10.0.2* #5337, #4919 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
